title: S7E22 – "Ghoulish Gateways" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author James Colton, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about deals worth dying for, haunting housing, killer curiosity, and perilous pacts.
